description:
An easy-to-use alternative to the standard windows file manager.

FreeCommander is an easy-to-use alternative to the standard windows file manager. The program helps you with daily work in Windows. Here you can find all the necessary functions to manage your data stock. You can take FreeCommander anywhere – just copy the installation directory on a CD or USB-Stick – and you can even work with this program on a foreign computer.
- Bug fix: "Tools->Toggle font size" raise exception if menu is defined as toolbar
- Bug fix: Multirename with exiftool is broken
- Bug fix: Viewer settings - saving EXIF tags per file extension does not work if tags field is empty
- Bug fix: The background color in the tree maybe black
- Bug fix: Option "Show popup menu for left button drop" is broken under WWindows 11
- Bug fix: Exception is possible if using Shift+F6 (Move)
- Bug fix: Favorite folders tree - after adding new item or removing item, all tree items disappear (rarely happens)
- Bug fix: Tree panel position after switching from one to dual panel maybe wrong (if option tree per panel is used)
- Bug fix: Replacing existing files during the synchronization is slow
